attributes.action: Stop paying fat cat bankers payouts to keep their luxurious lifestyles when the tax payers are struggling to keep their heads above water
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We propose that nobody pays their tax bill in January until the government promise not to give our money straight to the fat cats. As much as we understand the tax payers have bailed out the banks, why are we paying huge payouts to those that caused this problem in the first place and allowing them to continue their lifestyle at the detriment to all of ours

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
